channel.title: Comments on: WoWarcraft Voice Chat Beta

item.title: By: Molly
item.dc:creator: Molly
item.description: As Laura asks, anyone used ooVoo? I write for ooVooworld, the unofficial WOM world for ooVoo, and have heard of lots of case studies of people using it for RPG, Second Life etc - does anyone here find it good for gaming?
item.content:encoded: As Laura asks, anyone used ooVoo? I write for ooVooworld, the unofficial WOM world for ooVoo, and have heard of lots of case studies of people using it for RPG, Second Life etc – does anyone here find it good for gaming?

item.title: By: brackishwater
item.dc:creator: brackishwater
item.description: I've had decent success rates in LOTRO with their voice chat, but this still wont get me to return to WoW.
item.content:encoded: I’ve had decent success rates in LOTRO with their voice chat, but this still wont get me to return to WoW.

item.title: By: Sako
item.dc:creator: Sako
item.description: "Hur hur hur, are you a girl? Get on voice chat!"
item.content:encoded: “Hur hur hur, are you a girl? Get on voice chat!”

item.title: By: Laura
item.dc:creator: Laura
item.description: Ick...I only use the dreaded PUG on early Saturday/Sunday mornings and I avoid them then unless I'm desparate...the thought of hearing out loud some of that chat *shudder*
item.content:encoded: Ick…I only use the dreaded PUG on early Saturday/Sunday mornings and I avoid them then unless I’m desparate…the thought of hearing out loud some of that chat *shudder*

item.title: By: Val
item.dc:creator: Val
item.description: And you don't even live in Europe! Imagine it with Belgians!
item.content:encoded:
And you don’t even live in Europe!
Imagine it with Belgians!
